job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of integrating AI features into a complete product, covering both front-end and back-end development.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to building and integrating web applications, a fundamental software development task, with an AI enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the full lifecycle of software development, including ownership and iteration, which falls under core software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the integration aspect of the role, emphasizing that AI work is not siloed but part of a larger product development effort.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the requirement for full-stack development and integration, a core software engineering skill.

job_tasks.phrase: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on building new applications and driving innovation, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software development process of translating ideas into products, emphasizing full-stack capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to working with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) to create tools and features, which falls under model development and application of AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves developing AI applications with a focus on outcomes, aligning with the application of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the impact on students and the educational technology sector, indicating an understanding of business context and user needs.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: This describes working with stakeholders to align solutions with user needs, a key aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding high-level business ideas and translating them into concrete products, demonstrating business acumen.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with a global team and the importance of effective communication of complex ideas.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the collaborative nature of the role and the need to work with various experts.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly addresses the need for continuous learning and staying updated with advancements in AI and web development.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the expectation of innovative thinking and taking ownership of the entire product, which aligns with innovation and ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This task explicitly states taking ownership of the entire development process, fitting the 'Ownership' aspect.

soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration and communication skills.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes core software engineering tasks (full-stack development, integration, ownership of the product lifecycle) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude (Macro-Category B), the primary focus is on integrating these AI capabilities into broader web applications rather than deep model development or specialization in GenAI tasks. The role is about building AI-powered software, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the expectations for the role, explicitly stating the blend of full-stack development with AI integration. It also clearly defines what the role is NOT, which helps in precise classification. The emphasis on integrating AI into front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product, and working with specific LLMs points strongly to the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.
